summary: REQ-1 and REQ-3 appear implemented: App now renders routes immediately (fail-open) with background decommission checking, and NotificationPanelErrorBoundary now shows an inline fallback message instead of returning null. REQ-2 appears partially implemented: VotingPromoSection/LivePollWidget add visible loading and error UI, but the diff excerpt does not confirm the required explicit empty/no-active-poll state is preserved/shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: If there is no active poll, the user sees the existing “No Active Poll” state (or equivalent) instead of empty space.
missing_requirements.reason: LivePollWidget adds loading and error states, but the provided diff snippet is truncated before showing how the widget renders when there is no active poll (e.g., poll/status data is null/absent).
